function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Language barrier in translation of responses might result in misunderstanding of the intended meaning.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of open-ended responses can lead to incorrect analysis and conclusions.","Mitigation":"Use bilingual experts to accurately translate open-ended responses and verify the translated content for accuracy.","Technologies":"Translation software, bilingual experts, quality assurance tools for translation verification.","People":"Translators, data analysts, researchers, stakeholders","Owner":"Research team, translation team"},{"Description":"Data privacy and security risks associated with the collection and storage of open-ended responses.","Impact":"Potential unauthorized access to sensitive information, data breaches, and privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Implement robust data encryption, access controls, and user authentication methods. Adhere to data protection regulations and obtain consent for data collection.","Technologies":"Encryption algorithms, access control systems, user authentication mechanisms, data protection software.","People":"Respondents, data subjects, data analysts, IT professionals","Owner":"Research team, IT security team"},{"Description":"Bias and subjectivity in the text mining analysis leading to skewed interpretations.","Impact":"Inaccurate insights, misleading conclusions, and biased representations of open-ended responses.","Mitigation":"Use diverse and unbiased text mining algorithms, involve multiple analysts for validation, and provide transparency in the analysis process.","Technologies":"Unbiased text mining algorithms, validation tools, transparency platforms for analysis.","People":"Analysts, researchers, stakeholders","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"}]}
